sentences.text: So you finally decided to wake up.
I was afraid we wouldn't get a chance to speak.
We know about the photographs you took.
We've already got your picture of the eye and destroyed them.
I get you think you're some hero in this.
But if you knew what we know, you would leave the public be.
While the masses are thrilled by a new discovery.
We know the horror behind the mystery.
And, since you now know too...
We have no choice but to remove you before word is spread.
Don't bother trying to say any last words.
No one that can hear them will care.
